column22: We provide our trainees with a high quality training environment. Our patient population is very diverse, from an extraordinary array of pathologies to cultural, socioeconomic, and ethnic diversities. The program boasts a state-of-the-art UCSF Fresno Center for Medical Education and Research. Our residents and faculty participate in clinical research. Our mission is to produce well-rounded internists, prepared for general IM or fellowship, for which our grads have been very competitive.

column22: Our highly innovative program prioritizes a growth mindset, team mentality, and passion for doing what's right for the patient. column22: CMC offers a unique residency experience of a smaller program class size within a large academic medical center. We are strongly committed to resident education, wellness, scholarship, and excellence in clinical training within a supportive, caring community. Our graduates have achieved a 100% ABIM pass rate for 12 consecutive years. Our program offers an outstanding fellowship match rate, exciting opportunities in global health, and an innovative curriculum in bedside ultrasound.

column22: The IM residency at CMC has a unique track in partnership with Weill-Cornell that sends residents to the Cornell IM residency for PGY1 before finishing PGY2/PGY3 years at CMC. column22: Our training program prepares residents for ambulatory practice, hospitalist medicine or fellowship in a supportive environment with diverse patient population and strong academic focus.
